name: dry food for kittens
title: Vital Balance Junior · dry food for kittens · Chicken & cereals
description: Vital Balance dry food for kittens Chicken & cereals Duactis - Junior

mainInformation.origin: You can find information about the origin on the packaging in the store.

petFoodBasicInformation.composition: Composition: Chicken (17%) (including bone, meat, skin), dried poultry protein, wheat (14%), wheat gluten, animal fats, soya meal, corn protein meal, pea protein, corn starch, dried chicory root (2%), corn, minerals, digest (with added heat treated Lactobacillus Delbrueckii and Fermentum powder 0.025%), Yeasts, fish oil.
petFoodBasicInformation.additives: Additives: Nutritional additives: IU/kg: Vit A: 31000; Vit D3: 1000; Vit E: 400; mg/kg: Vit C: 140; taurine: 700; Iron(II) sulphate monohydrate: (Fe: 150); Calcium iodate anhydrous: (I: 2.3); Copper(II) sulphate pentahydrate: (Cu: 15); Manganous sulphate monohydrate: (Mn: 54); Zinc sulphate monohydrate: (Zn: 130); Sodium selenite: (Se: 0.16). antioxidants.

usageInformation.additionalInformation:
PURINA VITAL BALANCE DUACTIS® is a special nutritional formula with beneficial functional bacteria that scientifically proven to strengthen your cat's defences.


PURINA VITAL BALANCE DUACTIS® is a dual defense formula developed by Purina's nutritionists and veterinarians that contains

- Beneficial functional bacteria that help support your cat's natural antibody production from the inside

- Key nutrients, including Omega 6 fatty acids, which promote healthy skin and coat from the outside

 
The high-quality Purina VITAL BALANCE DUACTIS® recipes are available in a wide range of tasty varieties.

No added colorings, no added artificial flavors and no added preservatives

petFoodStorageInformation.instructions: Feeding guide : Should be introduced at 3 to 4 weeks of age. Product should be mixed with water to make eating easier. Increase the quantity as the kitten starts to eat more and reduce the quantity of water added when kitten is able to eat the food alone. Each kitten is different, depending on the kitten activity level and body condition, food amounts and/or time allowed to eat may need to be adjusted. Increase gradually the amount of food given during gestation/lactation. Fresh, drinking water should always be available. Discover also Vital Balance high quality nutrition in wet products with a range of delicious recipes specifically to meet your cat’s tailored needs

otherInformation.legalDesignation: Complete pet food for kittens. Recommended for pregnant and lactating cats
otherInformation.distributorStreetAndNumber: (CH) Nestlé Suisse S.A., Nestlé Purina PetCare, CP 352, CH-1800 Vevey

remarks.value: Keep pet food in a cool and dry place.

mainSpecificities.value: Die empfohlenen täglichen Mengen sollten sich je nach Wetter,  dem Aktivitätslevel der Katze und ihrem physischen Allgemeinzustand richten. Sauberes,  frisches Trinkwasser sollte jederzeit zur Verfügung stehen.
